ChapterShortDescription: GDG Port-of-Spain is the official Trinidad & Tobago chapter of the Google Developers Group! We are a local community of passionate tech makers and enthusiasts building the technolgical revolution of tommorrow. Join us today membership is free!
ChapterLongDec: GDGs are local groups of software developers who are specifically interested in Google products and APIs. GDG, Port of Spain, is the official Chapter for Trinidad and Tobago. We hope to bring together Developers, professionals and tech enthusiasts in events catered around various technologies and APIs.
aboutGDGProgram: GDGs are local groups of developers who are specifically interested in Google products and APIs. Each local group is called a GDG chapter and can host a variety of technical activities for developers - from just a few people getting together to watch our latest videos, to large gatherings with demos and tech talks, to hackathons.
